item.description: Meet other local Euchre players like yourself- be lucky getting a loner whilst playing with partners of like-minded attitude, having some laughs, sipping your favorite beverage, sharing some skills in the game (no table talking, haha), and just generally enjoying yourself in one of the most addictive and exciting card games, EUCHRE!!! You don't have to be an elitist, but you do need to have the passion for the game (not necessarily obsessive though), and the rest will take of itself. So here's to fun and fabulous future Euchre games and new friends to come. Join one join all...
item.name: The North of Boston Euchre Meetup
